text: Jerusalem International Airport (or Atarot Airport) was an airport north of Jerusalem, near Ramallah. It was the first airport in the British Mandate of Palestine. It has been closed since the Second Intifada, in 2010. == Gallery == Arkia 4X-ASR at Jerusalem.jpg Jerusalem airport Atarot 2010.jpg == Other websites == * Jerusalem Airport in lowshot website Category:Airports in Asia Category:Airports in Israel Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Mandatory Palestine
title: Jerusalem International Airport
